FuncDef:
The evpn e-tree-leaf command configure leaf attributes in the VSI-LDP-PW view.
The undo evpn e-tree-leaf command deletes the configured leaf attributes in the VSI-LDP-PW view.
By default, no leaf attributes are configured in the VSI-LDP-PW view.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
In VPLS splicing with MPLS EVPN E-LAN network, if users do not want the CE-to-CSG traffic to be sent back to CE, run the evpn e-tree-leaf command to configure leaf attributes for ASG in the VSI-LDP-PW view.
